挨

Значения

Распахивать, приветствие

Мнемоника

Рукой 扌 дружески хлопать по спине. Стрела 矢, дыхание ム (энергия) которой мала, символизирует слабость ударов. Тесно, близко, рядом. В японском языке образует понятие «тусовка, приятный светский разговор» (aisatsu).

humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " hand " and " knowing ", the original meaning is hit and push. "Shuowen": "Knock the back. From the hand, the sound." "Liezi‧ Huangdi": "Since then he insulted and deceived, blocked the secret and faced the pillow, and died."

" Together " can mean approaching. Qian Shu Guanxiu's poem "Lan Yao He "Ji Xuan Ji"": "A good bird suffers from flowers, and Qing breeze is too late to leave the hospital."

"To endure " also means to rely on. Ming Tang Xianzu's "The Peony Pavilion‧ Wedding Walk": "Who would like to be alone?"

" Success " also means one by one. In Ming Liu Ruoyu's "Zhu Zhong Zhi · Internal Ministers and Directors": "Anyone who lacks writing in each yamen will have a printed memorial to discuss it, and several names will be assigned by order, and they will be scattered by name."

" Suffer " said squeeze. "Water Margin" Chapter 36: "Song Jiang separated the crowds and went in to see it, but it turned out that it was a gun stick selling plaster."

" Suffering " can also mean suffering. Jin Dong Jieyuan's "The Tune of the Western Chamber", Volume 2: "Up to the top door, how can you end up in a hurry?"

humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「矣」聲，本義為打、推擊。《說文》：「擊背也。从手，矣聲。」《列子‧黃帝》：「既而狎侮欺詒，擋秘挨枕，亡所不為。」

　　「挨」可表示靠近。前蜀貫休《覽姚合〈極玄集〉》詩：「好鳥挨花落，清風出院遲。」

　　「挨」也表示依靠。明湯顯祖《牡丹亭‧婚走》：「想獨自誰挨？」

　　「挨」還表示依次。明劉若愚《酌中志‧內臣職掌紀略》：「凡各衙門缺寫字者，即具印信本奏討，奉旨撥若干名，即挨名給散。」

　　「挨」也表示擠。《水滸傳》第36回：「宋江分開人叢，挨入去看時，卻原來是一個使槍棒賣膏藥的。」

　　「挨」還可表示遭受。金董解元《西廂記諸宮調》卷二：「上至頂門紅颩颩，事急怎生挨？」

Radicals: 扌, ム, 矢  (fingers, private, arrow)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use your fingers when you're in private to use an arrow to push open things.
You're in private in your own room, no one else is around. Now you wrap your fingers around this big arrow, and you push open your door, your curtains, your windows. It's weird, but you really enjoy this.
Reading Mnemonic
